titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow individuals and businesses a credit against income tax for the purchase of Energy Star compliant clothes washers and dryers.
Energy Efficient Appliance Tax Credit for Washers and Dryers Act of 2007
Energy Efficient Appliance Tax Credit for Washers and Dryers Act of 2007

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Energy Efficient Appliance Tax Credit for Washers and Dryers Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for 25% of the cost (up to $500) of clothes washers and dryers which meet requirements for the Energy Star program. Terminates such credit after 2016.
